data.author: Elijah Kang

changelog.release_notes:
- Added Pebble Time 2 Support
- Added Disable Health
- Added Show Seconds
- Added menu icon
- Fixed negative symbol for temperature

- Added 2 color themes: Purple & Neon
- Fixed BT disconnect icon misalignment on Pebble Time Round
- Added Quick View support

- Completely rewritten code for better optimization
- Added Pebble 2 Support
- Added Heart Rate for compatible models
- Added Weather Underground support
- Added Master Key support
- Switched to Clay settings page
- Added BT Disconnect vibration toggle
- Added Date Format
- Added Weather Update Interval: 15 - 60 minutes
- Added Weather Icon
- Added languages: Español, Deutsch, Nederlands, Français, Italiano
- Fixed the 8 character on the font
- Cleaned up background graphic for monochrome displays

-Added 4 new color schemes
-Added 6 different faction emblems to choose from
-Added high contrast mode

-Cleaned up graphic positioning
-Dimmed the background to make it easier to read text
-Slightly lowered file size

-Added automatic sleep settings if Pebble Health is available.
-Optimized coding.

-Updated graphics
-Fixed weather bug
-Optimize battery usage
-Fixed minor bugs

-Added configuration page with various weather settings
-Reduced file size

-Added 7 day step graph
-Added location based weather
-Fixed battery icon bug
-On monochrome displays, adds a black background behind date & temperature to make it easier to read
-Added support for Pebble Classic & Pebble Time / Time Steel!

data.description:
Free

==Overview==
Inspired by the smartwatch from The Division; now you can rock your Pebble like an agent!

==Features==
-12 / 24 hour time
-US / EU date format
-BT Disconnect Vibration & BT Icon
-Battery level
-Low Battery use (A Rating)
-Imperial / Metric units
-Temperature & Condition
-Weather powered by OpenWeatherMap* or Weather Underground*
-Line Graph to show your step progress thoughout the past 7 days
-Daily Step counter next to the line graph
-Turning off the weather allows you to choose an emblem from 5 factions in The Division or go Rogue
-Quick View Compatible
-Master Key Support (pmkey.xyz)

-Languages: English, Español, Deutsch, Nederlands, Français, Italiano

Remember to leave a ❤ if you enjoy using The Division!
Credits to NiVZ78 for providing some assets.

*An API key from openweathermap.org or wunderground.com is required enable weather features. It's free to register.
